messages: c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:42): Hi there b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d.
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:43): How was the weekend?
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:47): thanks for asking, a real smash :-)
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:47): Lovely!

b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:48): c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca, had a good time friday playing jazz (autumn leaves, etc... :-) Then went to Berlin on Sunday, still there, we celebrate the 50. anniversity of the European Union over here
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:50): Very nice! Lots of parties and such?
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:50): And Jazz eh? I'm a big fan of the stuff.
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:51): c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca, cool, glad you like it
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:51): c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca, its quite fun, I tend to move between free music and jazz back and forth over time
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:52): and this very related to what we are doing here
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:52): like sometimes, I really just want to play without thinking too much
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:52): and I end up with funk
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:52): like 2 or 4 chords
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:52): but then, every now and then
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:52): Very nice. :)
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:52): u miss those harmonies
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:53): and u only get them if you thoroughly study jazz standards
52042f566f02d3a63ff64ac064e36cf1 (19:53): None of my mails are on the list :(
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:53): c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca, so just a lot like adherend strictly to a declarative spec
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:53): Ah see, I just enjoy listening. :)
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:53): while funk is more like scripting along...
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:54): Hehe
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:54): yeah, jazz standards are quite restrictive
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:54): u need to get those harmonic changes right
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:54): otherwise it dosn't sound nice
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:54): nods.
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:55): whereas e.g. funk is more open and forgiving
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:55): but it can easily end up in a mess then
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:55): especially when playing together with more people
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:56): So then whom would be the version control? ;)
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:57): c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca, interesting one...
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:57): in jazz, you have about one or two dozen chords per song
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:57): so when improvising, you get so much room and possibilities, you can stay in the one big version and evolve within in
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:57): with simpler music
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:58): you really need to stop playing and tell the other musicians that something is changing now, otherwise it gets dull, so you need versioning
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:58): of course, you can continue to play and shout at the other musicion a harmonic change
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:58): but thats a hack
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:58): you then yell on stage
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (19:59): WE'RE GOING TO A MINOR NOW, OK?
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (19:59): :)
c938c62ecadcab91676bdf5e857fb8ca (20:03): I'll be back in a few. Morning stand-up at the office, wee!
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (20:05): That would be a good analogy for <svg> and <math> elements. The document shouting "WE'RE GOING TO SVG MODE NOW, OK?" to the parser
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (20:07): And then the parser goes "Eh, A minor? I haven't learned that one yet"
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (20:08): weren't namespaces meant for this?
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (20:08): b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d: HTML can't really have namespaces
b5f36805a40efe87130ca9a70858457d (20:09): SGML-based HTML, right
139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884 (20:09): there is no SGML-based HTML
